title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Designing Effective Evaluation Methods for Online Health Professional Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of health science concepts and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the rubric development process for evaluating the effectiveness of online classes in health professions education.
Learners can design rubrics incorporating core evaluation elements such as interactivity, assessment methods, and ethical considerations.
Learners can analyze actual online class cases using developed rubrics and propose improvement directions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
